short_summary: Renouvellement de soutien et maintenance de l’appareil 3PAR pour BSGG du 30 mars 2024 au 29 mars 2027 \
description: 3PAR Appliance Maintenance and Support Renewal for OSGG  –March 30, 2024 to March 29, 2027 2025Milestone Payment Schedule and Provisions for 2 additional one year option periods included.The financial evaluation will be conducted by calculating the Total Bid Price and will be based on the sum of all total prices for the deliverables, as per Table 3, specified in Annex B, GST/HST extra.Bids must be submitted through the P2P portal by the date and time indicated on page 1 of the bid solicitation.
